name: Idle Magic Wall
description:
I built that game in GMS and now i'm currently learning another game engine.

please don't be harsh on your reviews, mind that it's my first attempt of making a game.

Idle Magic Wall is a game which you generate ores through the Magic Wall and make upgrades to farm faster money!

I’ve been working this game now and then but had a lot of work to make this game possible and learned lot of stuff working on it, so feel free to give me feedback if something wrong to improve myself!

Instructions:

Click anywhere but buttons to make Miner/s work faster.

Upgrade Ores for more income and upgrades bonus.

Buy Miners to auto mine and upgrade them for faster mining speed.

Prestige to get Points for extra Passives from 4th Tab.
